title: Sri Lanka LOLC Finance makes share buy back offer
byline: LOLC Finance is offering to buy a share at 6 rupees each.

title: Sri Lanka's stock exchange seeks public opinion on listing rule change
byline: To relax the application of the minimum public holding requirement for companies listing via introductions

title: Sri Lanka rupee trades flat, bond yields down
byline: An issue of Rs.111,000 million Treasury Bonds was ongoing.

title: Sri Lanka electricity regulator to move to fairer, less discriminatory pricing
byline: You cannot do it overnight, but there should be some way of moving forward and narrowing it

title: Central banks in Asia could cut rates further, but caution warranted: ADB
byline: "Central banks in the region should stand ready to act and cut."

title: Sri Lanka president meets German foreign minister
byline: Earlier in the day Disanayake met German President Frank-Walter Steinmeier.
